channel.title: Help - Blocking Words
channel.description:
Ok, so i was looking in my client and the client blocks out the Words, but that will be a big problem cuz, some one can just use another client and still say the same thing, so i wanna do it server-sided, but how?
I am not a newby coder, im ok at it lol, but here i am giving an exmaple at the top of my head so i hope you'll understand:
[code] If Player.chatContains( .com || .COM || Web || NO-iP) { *Blah blah blah* [/code]
and also how can i block kids with names like Owner Engen or Mod segen Admin k0 and so on...

item.title: Help - Blocking Words
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

For the ‘Owner’ ‘Admin’ ‘Mod’

call… this…

if(playerName.contains("Mod")){ println("Username Not Allowed!"); returncode = (add your custom return code here >.>) return; }

in the initialize method.

Read full topic
